column17:
Product Description

Nirus Hair Base Velcro Bumpits is extremely light and invisible. Very easy to fit just lift up your own hair and put it on! Just put on your hair self-gripping leave-in volumizing hair inserts and give your hair instant volume and let you enjoy feeling confident and beautiful like you just stepped out of a professional salon. Use it this way : Choose one hair pumper base and get your hair ready. Take a section of hair from the top of head and position the base under this section. Make sure you cover the base with the hair on top and around it. Use a hair clip to keep the base in position.
